statements: GRANT SELECT, INSERT ON geolocation_data TO user1;
GRANT UPDATE ON geolocation_data TO user2;
GRANT DELETE ON geolocation_data TO user3;
GRANT SELECT ON location TO user1;
GRANT INSERT ON address TO user2;
GRANT UPDATE ON location, address TO user3;
GRANT SELECT ON Locations TO user1
GRANT INSERT, UPDATE ON Locations TO user2
GRANT SELECT, UPDATE, DELETE ON Countries TO user3
GRANT SELECT ON location_data TO user_role
GRANT INSERT, UPDATE ON user_location TO user_role
GRANT DELETE ON trip_data TO user_role
GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE ON locations TO my_user;
GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE ON cities TO my_user;
GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE ON countries TO my_user;
